item.description:
Join the Newcomers group for drinks and karaoke. Place? To be determined. Usually we have gone to the Penalty Box on North Main Street for its cozy (okay, more like divey) atmosphere and reasonable drink prices, but I am open to new suggestions. Let me know where you would like to go by answering the question that pops up after you enter your rsvp.

Update: Most votes were for the Penalty Box. See you at 9pm ;-)

For more information:

http://www.myspace.co...
http://sites.google.c...
http://www.jamenterta...
item.how_to_find_us: I will probably be the only Asian girl in the whole place.
item.name: Drinks and Karaoke @ the Penalty Box
